title: Tata Power Solar Systems, ICICI Bank tie up to finance solar units
description: Tata Power Solar Systems Ltd has partnered with ICICI Bank to offer financing options for solar units to residential and corporate customers. Loans up to Rs 90 lakh are available with collateral-free options and up to 20-year tenures for higher loans with collateral, making it easier to invest in solar energy.
